tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE game_progress (
    player_id INT REFERENCES player_profiles(id),
    game_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    level INT DEFAULT 1,
    score INT DEFAULT 0,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, game_name)
);

CREATE TABLE player_profiles (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE player_progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    level_completed INT,
    score INT
)

CREATE TABLE indie_games (
    game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_title VARCHAR(50),
    release_date DATE,
    genre VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE player_ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    player_email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    player_level INT,
    player_experience INT
);

CREATE TABLE games (
    game_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    game_title VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    release_date DATE,
    game_genre VARCHAR(50),
    game_rating DECIMAL(3, 1)
);

CREATE TABLE player_progress (
    progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT REFERENCES players(player_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    game_id INT REFERENCES games(game_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    current_level INT,
    total_score INT
);
